price: Na ikiwa watakuasi basi sema: Mimi najitenga mbali na hayo mnayo yatenda.
arabic: فَإِنۡ عَصَوۡكَ فَقُلۡ إِنِّي بَرِيٓءٞ مِّمَّا تَعۡمَلُونَ
footnotes: Pindi wakikuasi na wasikufuate basi jitenge nao, na jitenge na vitendo vyao vya ushirikina na maasi yote.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: fa-in ʿaṣawka faqul innī barīon mimmā taʿmalūna
